org.restcomm.android.sdk

Interface RCDeviceListener


  • public interface RCDeviceListener
    RCDevice notifies its listener for RCDevice related events defined in this interface

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectivityUpdate(RCDevice device, RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus)
      RCDevice connectivity status has been updated, like losing internet connectivity, or regaining internet connectivity
      void onInitialized(RCDevice device, RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus, int statusCode, java.lang.String statusText)
      RCDevice initialized either successfully or with error (check statusCode and statusText).
      void onMessageSent(RCDevice device, int statusCode, java.lang.String statusText, java.lang.String jobId)
      RCDevice text message has been sent
      void onReleased(RCDevice device, int statusCode, java.lang.String statusText)
      RCDevice was released as a result of calling RCDevice.release()
      void onStartListening(RCDevice device, RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus)
      RCDevice started listening for incoming connections.
      void onStopListening(RCDevice device, int statusCode, java.lang.String statusText)
      RCDevice stopped listening for incoming connections (either as a result of correct processing, or error).

    • Method Detail

      • onInitialized

        void onInitialized(RCDevice device,
                   RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus,
                   int statusCode,
                   java.lang.String statusText)
        RCDevice initialized either successfully or with error (check statusCode and statusText). For regular scenarios (i.e. non-registrarless) success means that this means that registration is successful. For registrar-less scenarios success means that RCDevice is initialized properly (with no registration)
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        connectivityStatus - Connectivity status
        statusCode - Status code
        statusText - Status text

      • onStartListening

        void onStartListening(RCDevice device,
                      RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus)
        RCDevice started listening for incoming connections. This occurs when we asynchronously receive the result from RCDevice.updateParams() and it was successful, which means that we registered successfully
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        connectivityStatus - Connectivity status when started listening

      • onReleased

        void onReleased(RCDevice device,
                int statusCode,
                java.lang.String statusText)
        RCDevice was released as a result of calling RCDevice.release()
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        statusCode - Error code for the error
        statusText - Error text for the error

      • onMessageSent

        void onMessageSent(RCDevice device,
                   int statusCode,
                   java.lang.String statusText,
                   java.lang.String jobId)
        RCDevice text message has been sent
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        statusCode - Status code
        statusText - Status text
        jobId - In order to correlate this event to the RCDevice.sendMessage() it corresponds to we use the jobId

      • onStopListening

        void onStopListening(RCDevice device,
                     int statusCode,
                     java.lang.String statusText)
        RCDevice stopped listening for incoming connections (either as a result of correct processing, or error). This occurs when: a. RCDevice.updateParams() just sent out the registration request (we need that to convey to the UI that we are offline for a bit, until we get a response to the registrations), b. RCDevice.updateParams() registration failed or c. A periodic registration refresh failed in which case we need to notify the UI that we are offline
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        statusCode - Status code
        statusText - Status text

      • onConnectivityUpdate

        void onConnectivityUpdate(RCDevice device,
                          RCDeviceListener.RCConnectivityStatus connectivityStatus)
        RCDevice connectivity status has been updated, like losing internet connectivity, or regaining internet connectivity
        Parameters:
        device - Device of interest
        connectivityStatus - Connectivity status of Device
